title: Michael Moore | CNN’s Democratic Debate, Night One: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the first night of the second Democratic presidential debate of the 2020 election.

Then, Michael Moore talks about Mueller’s congressional testimony, why Democrats need to impeach the President and what candidate he thinks could take on Trump in 2020.

Moore also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
